about_the_game:
Constellum is a multiplayer card-driven tactics game with accessibility at its heart.

Welcome to Constelleum, the team vs team cosmic fantasy card battler. Pick from characters with distinct styles and mechanics. Play cards to move, disrupt opponents, summon companions, and more. Coordinate with your teammates to drive points to the opposing goal and claim victory.

We made Constelleum accessible from design through development

  • Constelleum integrates turn-based tactics (think Gloomhaven), the asymmetric characters of MOBAs, and deck building into a low-input and competitive experience

  • Strategize against another team in online versus multiplayer for deep, emergent gameplay

  • Join friends in a cooperative roguelite to outwit encounters, forge a path, and explore the World Beasts

  • Work together to perform exciting combos

  • 8 playable characters with their own mechanics and resources

  • Expansive card libraries unique to each character

  • Innovative mechanics offer a rich new way to build decks

  • Multiple immersive World Beasts to explore

  • Dozens of status effects
